audit_log.comment: CRITICAL FAILURE: escalation_required is hardcoded to True, so all initiatives are escalated regardless of risk score. The PRD requires escalating only high-risk initiatives and auto-approving low/medium risk changes.
Recommendations include a policy reference and OKR alignment, and provide a clear, human-readable output with a confidence level.
CRITICAL FAILURE: customer signals come from a static monthly Brand Health Tracking PDF source and the real-time stream is not connected, which is explicitly disallowed by the PRD.
The OKR dashboard tracks outcome metrics (task completion rate, drop-off reduction, NPS delta) and explicitly disables feature count tracking.

summary: The submission fails because two critical requirements are not met: it escalates every initiative instead of only high-risk items, and it lacks real-time customer signal aggregation. Even though explainable recommendations and outcome tracking are present, the module does not meet the minimum autonomy and data requirements for deployment.
